org.nise.ux.asl.face

Interface ClientInfoProfiler<D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Type of <Data> being listened on <listening port>

    public interface ClientInfoProfiler<D>
    Interface used for Profiling Clients
    Author:
    Yaser Eftekhari ( ^ - ^ )

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void profileClientInfo(RequestPackage<D> requestPackage)
      Implement this method to Log or profile all incoming requests with their client informations.

    • Method Detail

      • profileClientInfo

        void profileClientInfo(RequestPackage<D> requestPackage)
        Implement this method to Log or profile all incoming requests with their client informations.
        Parameters:
        requestPackage - Package containing client Info, ip, client request data
